name: R5-MedicationKnowledgeStatusCodes-R4-MedicationKnowledgeStatusCodes
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MedicationKnowledgeStatusCodes into FHIR R4

element.display: The medication referred to by this MedicationKnowledge is in active use within the drug database or inventory system.

target.display: The medication is available for use.

element.display: The medication referred to by this MedicationKnowledge was entered in error within the drug database or inventory system.

target.display: The medication was entered in error.

element.display: The medication referred to by this MedicationKnowledge is not in active use within the drug database or inventory system.

target.display: The medication is not available for use.
